{"id":1758953359,"question_id":3729,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1756961916,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"99 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1758953359/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Unit Conversion I","memory":"244.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    const static int MX = 1e9+7;\n    vector<vector<pair<int, int>>> adj_list;\n    vector<int> ans;\n    vector<bool> visited;\n\n    void dfs(int i) {\n        visited[i] = true;\n\n        for (auto x : adj_list[i]) {\n            if (!visited[x.first]) {\n                ans[x.first] = (ans[i] * 1LL * x.second) % MX;\n                dfs(x.first);\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    vector<int> baseUnitConversions(vector<vector<int>>& conversions) {\n        int N = (int)conversions.size() + 1;\n        ans = vector<int>(N, -1);\n        visited = vector<bool>(N, false);\n\n        adj_list.resize(N);\n        for (int i=0; i<N-1; i++) {\n            adj_list[conversions[i][0]].push_back({conversions[i][1], conversions[i][2]});\n        }\n        ans[0] = 1;\n\n        dfs(0);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"unit-conversion-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1193}
